content: next st chain 3 shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next st skip 2 sts double_crochet in next st shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next st 11 times skip last st turn 72 double_crochet row 4 rs - slip_stitch in next st chain 3 double_crochet in next st shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 2 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 2 sts 11 times skip last st finish off 96 double_crochet note when you encounter the chain-2 space work as normal don t work in backloop bl of the chain-2 space row 5 rs - skip 1st st join color c with a sdc in bl of next st double_crochet in bl of next 2 sts v-st see special stitches in chain-2 space double_crochet in bl of next 3 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in bl of next 3 sts v-st in chain-2 space double_crochet in bl of next 3 sts 11 times skip last st finish off 96 double_crochet row 6 rs - skip 1st st join color a with a sdc in bl of next st double_crochet in bl of next 2 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in bl of next 3 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in bl of next 3 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in bl of next 3 sts 11 times skip last st finish off 120 double_crochet note in this and all row you wish to change yarn colors always start fresh color on rs skip 1st st and join new color with a sdc stitch in the bl of the next st work remaining stitches of the first row of a new color in the bl only row 7 rs - skip 1st st join color c with a sdc in bl of next st double_crochet in bl of next 3 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in bl of next 4 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in bl of next 4 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in bl of next 4 sts 11 times skip last st finish off 144 double_crochet row 8 rs - skip 1st st join color b with a sdc in bl of next st double_crochet in bl of next 4 sts v-st in chain-2 space double_crochet in bl of next 5 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in bl of next 5 sts v-st in chain-2 space double_crochet in bl of next 5 sts 11 times skip last st turn 144 double_crochet row 9 ws - slip_stitch in next st chain 3 double_crochet in next 4 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 5 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 5 sts shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 5 sts 11 times skip last st turn 168 double_crochet row 10 rs -
